blogs.title: How I handled large file uploads in a Serverless Next.js app
blogs.description: I ran into Vercel's 4.5MB serverless function limit when uploading PDFs to OpenAI. The solution? Use client-side uploads to cloud storage with signed URLs, then process files from there.
